column4: The site I was given has no advice for actually DISCOVERING the card on my laptop. Any tips there?
I should have clarified. I can only see the card in the terminal. That's it.
I don't understand what you mean by that
do you have the correct kernel module(s) loaded?
do "lsmod" and look for your card
anyway, is there a daemon script for pcmcia in /etc/init.d/ ?
that may be what you're looking for
How would one normally find something in the PCMCIA slot? I dont know what it would look like if it WAS working
I've never owned a pcmcia card
How can I tell if I /etc/init.d/pcmciautils did anyhing?
